body, soul. You have to be recommended by a previous client,

Okay, look, I get a 10% referral fee. Plus...

translation.en: I'm not exactly worried about the competition.

I mean... And, you know, your work will pick up.

translation.en: Don't know how many more of these nice mornings I can take.

I don't know what's happening. I would just like you to leave my house, please.

I live here. I live here!

That's what I'd like to know. That's what I'd like to know.

is that I was upstairs with my wife.
